TextView.android:text:
Do Something!

This is an application that may help you to get out from your boredom zone. How?

If you are feeling bored, just try a click on our main button to show an activity that you may try doing.

Not satisfied? Click on it again and again until you find one sutiing for you.

Interested to do that activity again in the future? Save the activity and later just go into saved activities page to do it again!

Every activity has its own activity type. If you don't understand what that means just go into the activity types explanation page by accessing the menu!

Enjoy life more, enjoy using our application!
